We hereby inform you that AZAD Engineering Limited has signed a Long Term Supply Agreement with GE Steam Power GMBH  acting through its , GE Vernova Power business based in Baden, Switzerland for manufacture and supply of highly engineered and complex rotating and stationary Airfoils for advanced nuclear, industrial, and thermal power industries, meeting GE Vernova global demand in the power generation and essential industries. This current phase of the contract, valued at approximately USD  53.5 Million ( approximately INR 452.48 Crores)  is a robust step towards cementing our everlasting strategic relationship with GE Steam Power GMBH.

Vascon Engineers Limited receives Letter of Intent from Yucca Promoters LLP, Pune amounting to Rs.85.43 Crores

Focus Lighting and Fixtures Limited has informed the Exchange that its Wholly Owned Subsidiary Company, Plus Light Tech FZE has bagged an order worth INR 2,10,00,000/- (AED 9,18,000) excluding VAT, from Centrepoint (Landmark Retail Investment Co. L.L.C).
